title: Calories in 1 Stick of Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 stick butter: about 810 kcal with 92 g fat. Get full nutrition facts, per-stick breakdown, tweaks, and FAQs for better tracking.
assumptions: Standard US butter stick (113 g, salted, about 80% fat content).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, salting, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One stick of butter provides ~810 kcal, mostly from fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to light butter (reduced fat, ~50% less)
Opt for ghee (clarified butter, slightly denser fat)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 stick butter?
faqs.a: Approximately 810 kcal for a standard 113 g stick.

faqs.q: Is butter high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 58 g saturated fat per stick, mostly from dairy fats.

faqs.q: Calories in unsalted vs salted butter?
faqs.a: Same calories (~810 kcal), but unsalted has much lower sodium (~10 mg vs 607 mg).

faqs.q: How much fat is in one stick of butter?
faqs.a: Around 92 g total fat, making it nearly pure fat by weight.

faqs.q: Does brand affect calories in butter?
faqs.a: Slightly; organic or European styles may vary by 5-10% due to fat content differences.
